elements.title: Which other buttons were also colored at the same time - without your intervention?
elements.correctAnswer: The years, mileages, colors, types and prices of the selected cars are also displayed - for further restriction, e.g. only limousines.

elements.title: A customer is only interested in red cars. Which two Toyota models can you offer him now?

elements.name: question5

elements.title: The same customer further restricts the specifications: The car should have less than 100,000km. How many cars can he choose from now?

elements.title: What can you say now about the cheapest car on offer?
elements.correctAnswer: DAEWOO Nubira, year 2017, a blue station wagon with 92 923km, which costs CHF 10 000.00
